Class InstanceGraphAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odpi.openmetadata.repositoryservices.enterprise.repositoryconnector.accumulators.ExceptionAccumulatorBase

  • public class InstanceGraphAccumulator
extends QueryAccumulatorBase
    InstanceGraphAccumulator provides the accumulator for an instance graph - this is a collection of related entities and relationships.
